pages.title: Dromedary
pages.text: The dromedary ($(o)Camelus dromedarius$()), also known as Arabian camel, is a large even-toed ungulate, of the genus Camelus, with one hump on its back.$(br2)Males typically weigh between 400 and 600 kg ($(o)880 and 1,320 lb$()), and females weigh between 300 and 540 kg ($(o)660 and 1,190 lb).
